note: I've had many careers: Tech support and customer service, IT, tech journalism, freelance writing. I covered Apple for decades, for a variety of publications including Macworld, iMore and AppleInsider. These days my work is entirely IRL, so I mostly use social media for jokes and shitposts. Star Trek fan, '80s music enthusiast, especially New Wave, synthpop and "college radio." Married with kids. Cat lover. @flargh elsewhere, mostly. Personal account. ðŸ––
